attributes.action: The Student Housing Company to reduce rent for Students due to new lockdown laws
attributes.additional_details: Due to new lockdown laws, students are unable to return to their accommodation until mid February, but expected to pay full rent. This is unfair. When students have contacted TSHC about this, many have been threatened with legal action.
attributes.background: To get the Student Housing Company to reduce the rent that students have to pay this year due to the pandemic.

rejection.details:
Suspending payments for rent or ending a tenancy early is a matter for individual landlords, and not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Enable all students to end university tenancy agreements early due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553285

Reimburse student rents for all accommodation not used during this academic year: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560735

Implement support for university students during Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554299
